item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-17
item.description: Alphabetâ€™s Project Taara laser tech beamed 700TB of data across nearly 5km (3 minute read) While Google shut down Project Loon earlier this year, some of the technology remained in development.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-18
item.description: Apple Threatens to Terminate Epic Games’ Developer Accounts on August 28 (3 minute read) Apple plans to terminate Epic Games’ access to its App Store and app development tools by August 28.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-08
item.description: Uber launches grocery delivery in Latin America, Canada, with US to follow (2 minute read) Uber has launched an app-based grocery service in several Latin American and Canadian cities through its UberEats app.
